name: Memory Find
description:
From the creators of Memory Matches comes an all new memory game that keeps your mind sharp!

This memory game is easy to start playing. You will be given a few cards to remember. Memorize what’s on them and their location before being tested. After a bit the cards will flip over and you will need to recall and find each card one by one. Sounds simple enough but just wait until it gets more difficult.

As your streak gets higher you will have less time and more cards to remember. Your brain will be pushed to the limits. So get ready to give your full attention and concentrate. With this brain enhancement tool you’ll be able to feel your IQ going up.

The game is based on Miller’s Law of 7 ± 2. That’s the argued number of objects an average human can hold in working memory. Test your memory to see what side of 7 you are on.

Features:
49 Card Images
Retina Quality Graphics
Records Wins in a Row (Streak)
Time Pressure
